attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. Comes with the remainder of a 5 year or 120 000kms warranty and a 5 year or 90 000kms service plan, expiring in January 2026.
Price includes Nudgebar, Rollbar, Towbar and Tounneau cover, valued at R18000
This is an excellent bakkie. Not even 2 years old, with relative mileage and in excellent condition. The extended cab is the perfect option if you need a vehicle for both personal and business use. It has plenty of space behind the seats, to keep your tools, or seven shopping, safe and dry.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.

attributes.title: 2021 Isuzu D-Max 300 LX Auto Extended Cab

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215128. A Wonderful drive with comfortable leather seats. 
It has a near-perfect blend of good looks, great performance, generous standard kit and decent pricing.
The cabin is quiet at motorway speeds, there are no nasty shakes or cheap rattles and everything closes, clicks and connects smoothly.
The infotainment system uses Ford’s Sync 3 technology, which has good functionality
Additional extras to mention are: Lane Departure Warning; Rear Seatbelt Reminder as well as Hill Start Assist

attributes.title: 2019 Ford Fiesta 1.0 EcoBoost Titanium 5-dr

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **LOW LOW KMS**
**FULL SERVICE HISTORY**
**XENON HEADLIGHTS**
**LEATHER INTERIOR**
**REVERSING CAMERA**
**REAR PDC**
**BLUETOOTH**

Inside, the wheel is comfortable to hold with the infotainment system placed directly in the middle of the dashboard and the climate control system below that. The seats are also comfortable and widely adjustable, with the perfect amount of legroom in the rear seats for a car of this size.

The gearbox is superb, with a smooth and pin-point accurate selector, all designed to be a perfect mix between on-and-off-road.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252462. Balance of 4 year/ 120 000km warranty

If you are looking for an Automatic Double cab, no need to look any further. This Ford Ranger Double Cab is the vehicle just for you. Very impressive over loose and corrugated gravel. Ideal to have as a workhorse or a family vehicle as it is packed the latest technology such as a touch infotainment with apple car play and android auto, as well as safety features such as the multifunction steering wheel that gives you access at the tip of your fingers. 

Book your test drive today!
